review: LOVE THIS!!!! Makes my program viewing all the more personalized.
author: Lori

review: I really like the fire stick, in fact the one that just came is the second one I have purchased. Now I have one for my bedroom TV, and the big one in the living room. I thoroughly enjoyed "the Glades", and some of the movies I can stream with those, and prior, the "Bosch" series. I had a lot of Connelly's audiobooks, and love to see it come to life life on screen. Having Amazon prime, and having it for some time, I appreciate all the additions that come along that are accessible with the fire stick. I would highly recommend this as an addition to your home entertainment systems.
author: James LaBundy

review: The new update that allows for an browser login has really helped
author: Andy Parker

review: For anyone wanting to turn their regular tv into a SMART television...this is the product to buy! Setup was a breeze right out of the box and the update went with NO problems. The perfect fit for my bedroom television...thank you Amazon.
author: Tammy Garibay

review: works much better than expected, need  a good wifi signal so it works properly, got it for Netflix but youtube comes in good, has other service streaming channels that I haven't gotten around to trying
author: MetalVagabond

review: I was able to set up the Fire TV Stick easily.  So far the system has worked very well.

review: It worked great from the very beginning.
